comment.author: 34536224@N05
comment._content: Now submerged under Warragamba Dam. I stayed at a guest house in the valley late 40s/early 50s. I remember on a "100 degree" day sitting in the bed - a shallow rocky section - of the adjoining Coxs River near where it joined the Wollondilly.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: Thanks for sharing your story with us, mdlewisben!
